name: enamelling | enamelling | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4770/documentation

Enamel is a glass of a particular chemical composition and physical nature determined for the surface protection of metal.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts with the workpiece entering the process. The material on which this activity is applied it is not included as input.

The basic inventory is split up into the major process stages degreasing, corroding, cleaning and firing as well as an inventory for the materials used for enamelling. All stages of enamelling are summed up not including the metal sheets treated. Data for infrastructure and land are estimated roughly with data for a metal coating plant.
category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/259:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activit/2592:Treatment and coating of metals; machining

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The inventory has been elaborated for the European situation based on data investigated in Germany.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Single layer enamelling process. Powder coating technology. 600g enamel per m2 of steel metal sheet. Specifications of steel not known.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Study for Germany used as a basis for the assessment of the European average.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Literature review, data provided by producers.
